title: Is the .me domain good for a business site? - Quora

response.answer_text: The .me domain (ccTLD) is the Internet country code top-level domain for Montenegro. While many businesses utilize the .me domain name extension as a shortened name that redirects to their popular .com site, the .me is often thought of as a personal or blog type site without commercial intent. Personally, as an individual I might use the .me site as a landing page to learn more about me. But, for a business I would probably use it to redirect to my main .com site. Nevertheless, it’s totally up to you to use any domain name as you would want to. We know today that major search engines can rank any name based on good SEO and the .me is becoming popular. The choice is yours. Good Luck!

It’s a free country; you can use whatever trading name and domain name you wish, as long as someone else hasn’t already registered that name. While the me domain is intended for name.surname.me type applications, if eg your business is called Chrome, you could register Chro.me
